eu.play_project.play_eventadapter

Class AbstractSenderRest

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.play_project.play_eventadapter.AbstractSenderRest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RdfSender

    public class AbstractSenderRest
extends Object
implements RdfSender
    A sender of PLAY events. It is configured to publish events at a fixed RESTful HTTP endpoint under varying event topics (streams).
    Author:
    Roland St√ºhmer

      AbstractSenderRest(QName defaultTopic)

      AbstractSenderRest(String defaultTopic, String notifyEndpoint)

      • AbstractSenderRest

        public AbstractSenderRest(String defaultTopic)
        Construct a sender with a default topic to create messages. Messages will be sent to the endpoint defined in the PLAY properties in Constants.getProperties().

      • AbstractSenderRest

        public AbstractSenderRest(QName defaultTopic)
        Construct a sender with a default topic to create messages. Messages will be sent to the endpoint defined in the PLAY properties files.
